name: Department of the Interior
description: The United States Department of the Interior (DOI) is the United States federal executive department of the U.S. government responsible for the management and conservation of most federal land and natural resources, and the administration of programs relating to American Indians, Alaska Natives, Native Hawaiians, territorial affairs, and insular areas of the United States.

apis.name: Recreation Information Database (RIDB)
apis.description: Welcome to the Recreation Information Database (RIDB) Application Programming Interface (API). This API is provided for the purpose of accessing RIDB API endpoints, containing information for federal recreation areas, facilities, campsites, tours, and permits. Federal agencies provide and are responsible for the quality of data contained in the RIDB. Some data may be missing or incomplete. For example, some latitudes and longitudes may be blank. Please be mindful of this when searching for something in particular or applying proximity filters.
